body.value:
GEORGE PFEUFFER. CHRISTOPH PFEUFFER.
OFFICE OF
GEORGE PFEUFFER & BRO.
Dealers in
Farming Tools and Implements
MACHINERY AND GENERAL MERCHANDISE.

New Braunfels, Texas, June 8 1881

Professor L McInnis
A&M College

My dear Sir!

Your Note of the 5th to hand
and if Emil Kellner would not be offended
as he had tendered me the hospitalities
of his home before any one else, I would
jump at the chance of the Bachelors Hall
for reasons that I expect much Work for
the Board at its next session and on that account
could not be as punctual for meal hours &c
and any irregularities in hours of coming &
going would not inconvenience Bachelors
while it might a family. If you
will be kind enough to mention
this to the Captain with my best
regards to himself & family why I
am yours at least for a space to
sleep and work in.

Yours truly
George Pfeuffer
